message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't always get 50/50, let's start with a bit more for me!
I'll give you a bit more, but I still want a decent chunk too!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the majority this time!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're running out of time, take what you can get!
